items.content_html: Welcome to the lightweight blog system. If you're looking for a bloated, over-engineered mess, you've come to the wrong place. Built with Node.js, Express, and a dose of sanity, this thing gets straight to the point: serving content without the fluff.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: This is a music player that is designed to be lightweight and play music from your home computer rather than from the Internet. Users can choose a folder and the program will automatically search that folder for MP3 files to add to the library. If this project becomes advanced enough, I may upgrade it to become a hybrid music player (i.e. play music online and from your computer).
items.title: dommie123/WaveMusic: This is a music player that is designed to be lightweight and play music from your home computer rather than from the Internet. Users can choose a folder and the program will automatically search that folder for MP3 files to add to the library. If this project becomes advanced enough, I may upgrade it to become a hybrid music player (i.e. play music online and from your computer).
